pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 30     $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 0    $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Passive     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Beach    $(br)> $(n)Breeding:$() Seagrass (requires a beach nearby)$(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Lay eggs that can be harvested with $(thing)Silk Touch$(). $(thing)Baby Turtles$() drop $(item)Scute$() when they grow up to adults.
$(n)Drops:$() 0-2 Seagrass, 1 Bowl if killed though a Lightning Bolt  $(n)XP:$() 1-3
